articles.title: MBTA Hingham ferry service canceled for Feb. 13 due to ice in the harbor
articles.description:
The ferry is experiencing more cancellations than usual this winter due to thick ice brought on by the recent snow storm.

The post MBTA Hingham ferry service canceled for Feb. 13 due to ice in the harbor appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: MBTA canceled Hingham ferry service on February 13 due to ice in the harbor.
Cancellations are increasing this winter due to thick ice from recent snow storms.
Boston residents relying on ferry service face transportation disruptions this winter.

articles.title: Retired Gloucester firefighter dies days after being struck by Lowell police cruiser
articles.description:
Daniel Kennedy died nearly a week after he was allegedly struck by a Lowell police cruiser at UMass Lowell last Thursday.

The post Retired Gloucester firefighter dies days after being struck by Lowell police cruiser appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Retired Gloucester firefighter Daniel Kennedy died after being struck by a police cruiser.
Kennedy was hit at UMass Lowell on February 8, 2023, and died days later.
The incident raises concerns about police vehicle safety in busy campus areas.

articles.title: 5 players on Red Sox’ roster bubble entering spring training
articles.description:
The Red Sox still have several logjams in their outfield and within their pitching corps.

The post 5 players on Red Sox’ roster bubble entering spring training appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox face roster decisions as spring training approaches, impacting local fan expectations.
Five players, including Casas and Yoshida, are on the roster bubble ahead of training.
Outfield and pitching logjams could affect team performance and local game attendance.
